marklogic.body:
You're right, he remains the most stark contrast to maobama (and the other candidates) in this race. If he were younger, if he were less dogmatic on his foreign policies, if...
I hated him in the beginning. However, much of what he stands for is Spot on. It's the little things that killed him... but you are indeed right.
Now is the time to Align behind this dud (romney) of a candidate when it comes time to vote. If we vote on our principles and let maobama get re-elected, we're done. Done.
And you're right. There's no point in watching romney and maobama...
